hotel name: Van Der Valk Hotel Brugge Oostkamp
pos review: Friendly staff greeted us on arrival. Spacious and spotlessly clean room. Good restaurant for dinner and a comprehensive buffet breakfast.

hotel name: Van Der Valk Hotel Brugge Oostkamp
neg review: Problems with room,no light over sink,shower no control on temperature tv remote not working,I admit all fixed next day,price of breakfast

hotel name: Van Der Valk Hotel Brugge Oostkamp
pos review: Staff during the check out was different, she was extremely happy and she was keep saying apologiesses which made me feel she cares about her job and her hotel..
neg review:
Staff (Katrin or anything similar to it) during the check in, she was not nice at all.. 
There was a gentleman, withour namebadge he was nice and kind.. At least tried to help.
I did stay in room 327 it was nice experience, but this time I did request quite room, they give a room next to the motorway.. Could not sleep and extremely unhappy.

hotel name: Van Der Valk Hotel Brugge Oostkamp
Van Der Valk Hotel Brugge Oostkamp
neg review: The smell of sewers in the corridor outside our room. The slow and badly trained staff in the restaurant.

hotel name: Van Der Valk Hotel Brugge Oostkamp
pos review: Great hotel! Nice interior design, polite staff, amazing breakfast!

hotel name: Van Der Valk Hotel Brugge Oostkamp
pos review: Very nice hotel with an amazing buffet for breakfast.
